channel.title: Help compiling and running a 508
channel.description: when i compile/open"all" the SERVER(source) everything is fine, the path is spesefiad and then after it writes compiled (this and that) and says "click any key to continuie" and i press any key and it exits"all", im assuming it compiled. and running the source is ok too. i click on run and it says server online on 43594 or something. when i go client and i run( i compiled olready btw.) when i run this is what it says:"Error:signlink:223 signlink:372 applet_sub1:339 client:2198 |java.lang.runtime exceprion" and all the client page is juat white. any help please??

i am a heron. i ahev a long neck and i pick fish out of the water w/ my beak. if you dont repost this post on 10 other threads i will fly into your kitchen tonight and make a mess of your pots and pans

item.title: Help compiling and running a 508
item.dc:creator: @xdanio xdanio
item.description:
@xdanio wrote:

when i compile/open"all" the SERVER(source) everything is fine, the path is spesefiad and then after it writes compiled (this and that) and says “click any key to continuie” and i press any key and it exits"all", im assuming it compiled. and running the source is ok too. i click on run and it says server online on 43594 or something.
when i go client and i run( i compiled olready btw.) when i run this is what it says:“Error:signlink:223 signlink:372 applet_sub1:339 client:2198 |java.lang.runtime exceprion” and all the client page is juat white. any help please??

Read full topic
